mapper.select: SELECT m.movie_id, m.movie_nm, m.movie_nm_en, m.movie_open_dt, m.movie_age_rating, m.movie_running_time, m.movie_country, m.movie_plot, m.movie_trailer AS movie_trailer_url, m.movie_poster AS movie_poster_url, m.movie_imdb_score, m.movie_tmdb_score, g.genre_nm AS genre FROM movie m LEFT JOIN genre g ON m.genre_id = g.genre_id
SELECT movie_nm AS movieNm FROM movie
SELECT * FROM MOVIE ORDER BY (movie_tmdb_score + movie_imdb_score * 10) DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT m.movie_id, m.movie_nm, m.movie_nm_en, m.movie_open_dt, m.movie_age_rating, m.movie_running_time, m.movie_country, m.movie_plot, m.movie_trailer, m.movie_poster, m.movie_imdb_score, m.movie_tmdb_score FROM MOVIE m INNER JOIN PEOPLE pe ON m.movie_id = pe.movie_id WHERE pe.people_id = #{peopleId}

SELECT genre_id FROM genre WHERE
#{name} LIKE CONCAT('%', genre_nm, '%')
LIMIT 1

SELECT m.movie_id, m.movie_nm, m.movie_nm_en, m.movie_open_dt, m.movie_age_rating, m.movie_running_time, m.movie_country, m.movie_plot, m.movie_trailer, m.movie_poster, m.movie_imdb_score, m.movie_tmdb_score, g.genre_nm AS genre FROM movie m LEFT JOIN genre g ON m.genre_id = g.genre_id ORDER BY m.movie_open_dt DESC LIMIT 10
